name: Galaxia P147-Z1 (eVillator, gabrielsouki, DaiSerna)
description:
Galaxia P147-Z1 is a video game about a space tourist who during his return to his base, his intergalactic ship breaks down and he must stop in this galaxy to start the repair. Using his trusty jetpack and with an online teaching platform he will learn new skills that will ensure the perfect adventure.  
-----------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Galaxia P147-Z1 es un videojuego de un turista espacial que durante el regreso a su base, su nave intergaláctica se descompone y deberá detenerse en esta galaxia para empezar la reparación. Usando su confiable jetpack y con una plataforma de enseñanza en línea aprenderá nuevas habilidades que se agregarán a la aventura perfecta.
